description: This Python script demonstrates how to use persistent memory with an Agent, including creating user memories, printing chat history, and retrieving user memories.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of interacting with users and managing memory.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles user memories, including creation, retrieval, and clearing.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite database backend for storing memory data.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: SQLite storage backend for session data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent, optionally streaming.

methods.name: get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves memories associated with a specific user.
